TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnvalidatedRequestValuesWrapper extends System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValuesBase

summary.span: 为 类提供包装类，并提供对 HTTP 请求值的访问权限，不触发 ASP.NET 请求验证。

span.span: Provides a wrapper class for the class, and provides access to HTTP request values without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关请求验证的信息，请参阅。For information about request validation, see .

summary.span: 获取客户端在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下发送的 Cookie 的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of cookies that the client sent, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的 cookie。

span.span: The cookies from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取遵循网站名称的请求的 URL 的部分内容。

span.span: Gets the part of the requested URL that follows the website name, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 遵守网站名称的 URL 部件。

span.span: The part of the URL that follows the website name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks. 如果完整请求 URL 是`http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44`的值是`/default.aspx?id=44`。If the complete request URL is `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44`, the value of is `/default.aspx?id=44`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Url As Uri
public: virtual property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取请求的 URL 数据。

span.span: Gets the URL data for the request without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 一个对象，它包含该请求的 URL 数据。

span.span: An object that contains the URL data for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks. 你可以检索 URL 数据，如端口号、 主机名、 路径信息和有关从用户的数据此属性返回的对象。You can retrieve URL data such as the port number, host name, path information, and data about the user from the object that this property returns.
